meanings.definition: In a manner that is difficult to believe; unbelievably.
meanings.sent1: She ran incredibly fast in the race.
meanings.sent3: The cat danced incredibly well on its hind legs.
meanings.sent4: His magic tricks were incredibly mind-blowing.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks lit up the sky incredibly.

meanings.sent1: He incredibly loves to play soccer every day.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden grew incredibly tall.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel incredibly hoarded all the nuts in the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her voice incredibly echoed through the empty hall.
meanings.sent5: The storm incredibly flooded the entire street.
